Question
========

One study looked at a large number of Dutch couples whose both members work. Suppose the income is *X* of one and *Y* of the other, can we assume that the average of the total income *X* + *Y* is equal to *µx* + *µy*?

Answerlist
----------

* Yes
* No

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Yes: Correct
* No: Incorrect
